_description: Gospel for Friday of the first week in Advent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Unto saint Ione assembled þanffro ierusalem ful maniaman…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And worthi fruites furth to bringeOgaynes þe time of his comynge
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin “Dicebat Iohannes ad turbas.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Feriorum vi ebdomade prime aduentus domini Euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 2va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.153-159.
